metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12222 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libSDL2.a in Simple DirectMedia Layer (SDL)2.0.9. There is an out-of-bounds read in the function SDL_InvalidateMap atvideo/SDL_pixels.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12222` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl2-image-2.0-0 - 2.0.5+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

libsdl-image1.2 - 1.2.12-11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.5+dfsg1-1').
sdl-image1.2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.12-11').
